document_data.mainbody:
The Celebrants Blade was a beautifully crafted dwarven battle axe that originated from the stronghold of Dorns Deep.
The Celebrants Blade was so finely made that it was set within a monument in the forge of Dorns Deep.
The axe held a powerful +4 enchantment.
The Celebrants Blade was forged some time during or before the 13 century DR, by the master smith Briath Silverhand. It was made to honor Briaths patron deity, the dwarven god Moradin.
